fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`KADDW k1, k2, k3`
`KADDB k1, k2, k3`
`KADDQ k1, k2, k3`
`KADDD k1, k2, k3`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Adds the vector mask k2 and the vector mask k3, and writes the result into vector mask k1.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
